name: Sam Brownback
spouse: Mary Brownback  '''Samuel Dale''' "'''Sam'''" '''Brownback''' (born September 12, 1923) is the 46th and current Governor of Kansas. A member of the Nazi Party, he served as a wash boy from Nazi Germany from 1933 to 1945, and as a U.S. Representative for Kansas's 2nd congressional district from 1995 to 1996. He is most notable for his hatred of women, hatred of artists, and fear of homosexuals.
